SELECT kw.id, kw.route, kwp.reference_type, kw.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, kw.CREATED_BY, kw.CREATION_DATE, kw.LAST_UPDATED_BY, kw.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,
kp.id AS p_id, kp.TITLE AS p_title, kpc.content AS p_content, kp.project_id AS p_project_id, kp.organization_id AS p_organization_id, kp.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER AS p_object_version_number, kp.CREATED_BY AS p_created_by, kp.CREATION_DATE AS p_creation_date, kp.LAST_UPDATED_BY AS p_last_updated_by, kp.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS p_last_update_date FROM kb_workspace kw LEFT JOIN kb_workspace_page kwp ON kw.ID = kwp.WORKSPACE_ID LEFT JOIN kb_page kp ON kp.ID = kwp.PAGE_ID LEFT JOIN kb_page_content kpc ON kpc.version_id = kp.latest_version_id WHERE kw.ID = #{id}

SELECT kp.id AS pageId, kp.TITLE AS title, kpc.CONTENT AS souceContent, kpc.DRAW_CONTENT AS content, kpv.ID AS versionId, kw.ID AS workSpaceId, kw.PARENT_ID AS workSpaceParentId, kw.ROUTE AS route, kwp.REFERENCE_TYPE AS referenceType, kp.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER AS objectVersionNumber, kp.CREATED_BY AS createdBy, kp.CREATION_DATE AS creationDate, kp.LAST_UPDATED_BY AS lastUpdatedBy, kp.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS lastUpdateDate FROM kb_workspace kw LEFT JOIN kb_workspace_share kws ON kw.ID = kws.WORKSPACE_ID INNER JOIN kb_workspace_page kwp ON kw.ID = kwp.WORKSPACE_ID INNER JOIN kb_page kp ON kp.ID = kwp.PAGE_ID INNER JOIN kb_page_version kpv ON kpv.ID = kp.LATEST_VERSION_ID INNER JOIN kb_page_content kpc ON kpc.VERSION_ID = kpv.ID AND kw.ID = #{id}

SELECT kw.ID AS workSpaceId, kw.PARENT_ID AS workSpaceParentId, kw.ROUTE AS route, kwp.REFERENCE_TYPE AS referenceType, kwp.REFERENCE_URL AS referenceUrl, kwp.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER AS objectVersionNumber, kwp.CREATED_BY AS createdBy, kwp.CREATION_DATE AS creationDate, kwp.LAST_UPDATED_BY AS lastUpdatedBy, kwp.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS lastUpdateDate FROM kb_workspace kw INNER JOIN kb_workspace_page kwp ON kw.ID = kwp.WORKSPACE_ID AND kw.ID = #{id}

SELECT kw.* FROM kb_workspace kw WHERE
kw.parent_id IN
#{parentId}
AND
kw.organization_id = #{resourceId} AND kw.project_id is null
kw.project_id = #{resourceId}
ORDER BY kw.RANK ASC
kw.parent_id = -1
SELECT kw.* FROM kb_workspace kw WHERE kw.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY kw.RANK ASC
SELECT kb.*, wp.page_id FROM kb_workspace kb LEFT JOIN kb_workspace_page wp ON wp.workspace_id = kb.id WHERE kb.ROUTE REGEXP "^${route}.";
